function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of cases through spatial feedback effects","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement spatial distancing measures, travel restrictions, and regional lockdowns","Technologies":"Geospatial tracking, contact tracing apps, and regional monitoring systems","People":"Population of affected regions","Owner":"Local governments and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of spillover effects in the SEM model","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Incorporate spillover effects into the SEM model, refine the model to include spatial feedback","Technologies":"Spatial econometrics, geospatial modeling, and epidemic modeling","People":"Epidemiologists, statisticians, and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"}]}
